description: This file defines a React functional component named Modal, which provides a modal dialog with ESC key and backdrop click to close functionalities. It includes styling, accessibility attributes, and supports rendering custom content via props.

methods.name: Modal
methods.description: React functional component for rendering a modal dialog with close functionalities via ESC key and backdrop click.
